In England, in the seven days to 28 October, there were 235,470 new confirmed cases (416.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 October, there were 276,326 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 15% (40,856 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 November is 7,760,671 (13,723.5 cases per 100,000 population).
